Phase16Description: I have a piece of uncorrupted flesh collected from one of Zurke's experiments. I should return it to him.
Callback40Header: Tell Zurke what corpse the sample came from
Phase6Description:
There is a new sickness in the swamp, thanks to Zurke’s experiments. He claims to be in control, but the Tree of Whispers wishes it to be cleansed. 

Zurke treated three corpses with possible curses. He needs me to collect a sample from the least corrupted source and bring it back.
Toast: A growing sickness threatens the swamp.
Name: Perceived Threat
Phase55Description: I brought back Samil’s corpse back to Zurke. He seems pleased, but I do not yet know Zurke’s intentions. I should speak with him and ask.
